column5: English
column11: English

column5: That's the Heavy Workshop?
column11: So this is the Heavy-Machinery Workshop?

column4:
八工房の中で、生産台数
第二位の工房だよ。
column5: This workshop is ranked second out of the Eight.
column11: Out of the Hachi Workshops, this one comes in second place.

column4:
実用性が高く、強度に優れた
マリオネーションギアを作る
ことで知られてる。
column5: It's known for making highly practical and incredibly strong Marionation Gear.
column11: It's know for making highly practical, and incredibly strong Marionation Gear.

column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

工房主のドランは、一本気な
ガンコオヤジだけどね。
column5: The owner, Doran, has a one-track mind and is as stubborn as anything, though.
column11: The owner, Doran, has a one-track mind and is as stubborn as anything.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

まあ、職人ってのは
そんなもんよ。
column5: Well, a lot of craftsmen are like that.
column11: Well, a lot of craftsmen are like that.

column4:
工房が大きくなっても
性格は直しようがないからな。
column5: No matter how big the workshop gets, there's no changing their personality.
column11: Even though his workshop has grown so large, there's no changing someone's personality.

column5: All right, let's head in.
column11: Well, anyway, let's head in.

column4: ドラン＿ちょっとした驚き

column5: Galouye!
column11: Galouye!!

column5: I knew it was you!
column11: I knew it was you!!

column5: Long time no see.
column11: Long time no see.

column5: How ya been?
column11: How've ya been?

column4:
お！　そこにいるのは
メリッサ嬢ちゃんか！？
大きくなったな。
column5: Oh! And you must be the li'l lassie Melissa?! My, how you've grown.
column11: Oh! And you must be the lil' lassie Melissa?! My, how you've grown.

column4:
久しぶり。
ドランおじさん。
少し陽気になったみたい。
column5:
It's been ages, Uncle Doran!
Seems like you're keeping well.
column11:
It's been forever since I last saw you, Uncle Doran.
You seem to be keeping well.

column5: Of course.
column11: Of course.

column4: 何しろ、商売が好調だからな。
column5: After all, business is booming.
column11: After all, business is booming.

column5: Great work!
column11: Congratulations!

column4:
おう。だがよ。商売がうまく
いってるからって、決して
仕事に手は抜いちゃいないぜ。
column5: Ah, but ya know, with trading going so well, I never catch a break from work.
column11: Ah, but you know, with trading going so well, I never catch a break from work.

column4:
今でも、工房の人形は全部
オレが手を加えてるんだ。
column5: Even now, I'm still chipping in on every single one of our workshop's Puppets.
column11: Even now, I'm still chipping in with every single one of our workshop's mechs.

column4:
若い奴を押しのけて、
現場でバリバリやってるよ。
column5: Sometimes I hafta push the young'uns aside and take things into my own hands.
column11: Sometimes I have to push the young ones aside, and take things into my own hands.

column4:
アハハ。
あいかわらず元気だね。
column5:
Ahaha!
You're the same as ever.
column11:
Ahaha.
You're the same as ever.

column4:
人形が見たいんだろ？
さ、こっちへ来い。
column5:
You're here to check out the Puppets, right?
C'mon, over here.
column11:
You're here to check out the mechs, right?
Come on then, this way.

column4:
/c5人形重機ダンヴァー/c3。
重工房の最新作だ。
column5: /c5Heavy Machinery Puppet Dumver/c3, the Heavy Workshop's latest invention.
column11:
/c5HM Mech Denver/c3.
The Heavy-Machinery Workshop's latest invention.

column4: ダンプカーに見えるけどな……。
column5: But it looks like a dump truck...
column11: It looks a bit like a dump truck...

column5: It's multipurpose, m'boy.
column11: It's multi-purpose, m'boy.

column4:
変形スイッチを押せば、
いつでもマリオネットモードへ
変わるぞ。
column5: You can press the transformation switch anytime to swap into Marionette Mode.
column11: You can press the transformation switch at any time, to swap into Marionette Mode.

column5: Awesome!
column11: Awesome!

column4:
本来なら
１年待ちの人形なんだがな。
column5: Normally, you'd be waiting a year to buy this Puppet.
column11: Normally, there's a waiting time of one year for this mech.

column4:
特別に
好きな物を買えるように
手配しておくよ。
column5: But since you're such a fan, I'll make some special arrangements so's you can buy it.
column11: But since you're such a fan, I'll make some special arrangements so you can buy it.

column4:
いつでも買いに来てくれ。
ガハハ。
column5:
Come on down and pay for it anytime!
BWA-HAH-HAH!
column11:
Come on down and pay for it anytime.
Bwa hah hah.

column4: ガロイ親方＿まいったな

column5:
...O-oh, right...
Thanks, I owe you one.
column11:
...O-oh, right...
Thanks, I owe you one.
